entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:32 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain or drizzle near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 2. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 2. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. High zero. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 3. Forecast issued 06:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
